description: Safe demo data for App Store review. All content uses reflective language.

messages.content: I had a dream about flying over mountains

Flying dreams often surface during times of personal growth or when seeking new perspectives. Many people experience a sense of liberation or expanded awareness in such dreams. The mountains might represent challenges you've overcome or goals you're reaching toward. What emotions did you notice during the flight?

That sense of peace and freedom could reflect an inner state of acceptance or a period of reduced stress in your waking life. Dreams like this might appear when we feel unburdened or when we've resolved something that was weighing on us. It could be worth noting what's been going well lately.
I keep seeing water in my dreams

Water is one of the most common dream elements and often represents emotional depth and the flow of feelings. The state of the water—whether calm, turbulent, clear, or murky—might mirror your current emotional landscape. How did the water appear in your dreams?

That variation could reflect the natural ebb and flow of emotions in daily life. Calm water might appear during peaceful periods, while waves could surface during times of change or intensity. Many find it helpful to note their emotional state when they wake—it may reveal patterns worth exploring.

dream_journal.title: Flying Over Mountains
dream_journal.description: I was soaring over snow-capped mountains, feeling completely free and at peace. The sky was a brilliant blue.

dream_journal.title: Ocean Waves
dream_journal.description: Standing on a beach watching waves come and go. Sometimes calm, sometimes larger waves.

safe_assistant_prompts: What patterns do you notice in your thoughts lately?
How did you feel when you experienced this?
What might this recurring theme represent for you?
Many people find that this symbolizes personal growth.
Consider what emotions surfaced during this reflection.
This could be an invitation to explore further.
Some interpret this as a sign of inner change.
What resonates with you about this experience?
safe_response_templates: This pattern might represent {theme} in your personal journey.
Many people experience {symbol} dreams during times of {context}.
The {element} could reflect your current emotional state.
Some find that {symbol} appears when they're processing {emotion}.
This might be worth exploring further through journaling.
